檒字的基本解释

檒
fēng
古同“风”。
古同“枫”。

檒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fēng］
［《廣韻》方戎切，平東，非。］
(1)梵声；风行树上。
(2)同“楓”。
(3)“風”的古字。

檒字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　檒； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页556第30
【玉篇】古文風字。註見部首。又【類篇】風行木上曰檒。　又同楓。　又【唐韻】檒梵，聲也。　又【唐韻】房戎切。義同。

檒字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
檒字的起名意思

暂无。

檒
Basic explanation of words
檒
fēng
Ancient with the "wind".
The ancient same "Maple".
檒
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fēng］
["Guangyun" Fang Rongqie, Pingdong, Fei. ]
(1) Sanskrit sound; wind on the tree.
(2) Same as "Maple".
(3) The ancient word for "wind".
檒
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　檒; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 556 30
【Jade articles】Ancient style characters. Note see radicals. Also 【Classes】Popular wood is said to be 檒.　The same maple again.　[Tang Yun] again, call the Brahman, the sound is also.　[Tang Yun] Fang Rongqie again. The same meaning.
